front.title: Configuration of pro-active MPLS-TP Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) Functions Using RSVP-TE or LSP Ping

abstract.t: This specification describes the configuration of pro-active MPLS-TP Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) Functions for a given LSP using a common set of TLVs that is carried on either RSVP-TE or LSP Ping.
